org.openimaj.hadoop.tools.twitter

Class HadoopTwitterTokenToolOptions

  • java.lang.Object

      • org.openimaj.hadoop.tools.twitter.HadoopTwitterTokenToolOptions

extends org.openimaj.tools.InOutToolOptions
    Hadoop specific options for twitter preprocessing

    Sina Samangooei (ss@ecs.soton.ac.uk)

    • Constructor Detail

      • HadoopTwitterTokenToolOptions

        public HadoopTwitterTokenToolOptions(String[] args,
                             String[] originalArgs,
                             boolean beforeMaps)
                              throws org.kohsuke.args4j.CmdLineException
        Initialise the options
        Parameters:
        args - the arguments after going through the hadoop tool (i.e. minus the -D hadoop arguments)
        originalArgs - the original arguments as typed into the command line (useful for subhadoop tasks launched)
        beforeMaps - whether this job is occuring before the maps
        Throws:
        org.kohsuke.args4j.CmdLineException

      • HadoopTwitterTokenToolOptions

        public HadoopTwitterTokenToolOptions(String[] args)
                              throws org.kohsuke.args4j.CmdLineException
        Parameters:
        args - Just the arguments (hadoop arguments assumed to be the same)
        Throws:
        org.kohsuke.args4j.CmdLineException
